name: amandio c - polar value [shader pimped2]
milkdrop_raw:
MILKDROP_PRESET_VERSION=201
PSVERSION=2
PSVERSION_WARP=2
PSVERSION_COMP=2
[preset00]
fRating=5.000000
fGammaAdj=1.140
fDecay=1.000
fVideoEchoZoom=0.872
fVideoEchoAlpha=0.000
nVideoEchoOrientation=2
nWaveMode=7
bAdditiveWaves=0
bWaveDots=0
bWaveThick=1
bModWaveAlphaByVolume=0
bMaximizeWaveColor=1
bTexWrap=1
bDarkenCenter=1
bRedBlueStereo=0
bBrighten=1
bDarken=0
bSolarize=0
bInvert=0
fWaveAlpha=99.800
fWaveScale=0.007
fWaveSmoothing=0.500
fWaveParam=-0.400
fModWaveAlphaStart=0.500
fModWaveAlphaEnd=1.000
fWarpAnimSpeed=1.000
fWarpScale=1.000
fZoomExponent=1.00000
fShader=0.000
zoom=1.00990
rot=0.00000
cx=0.500
cy=0.860
dx=0.00001
dy=0.00001
warp=0.01000
sx=1.00000
sy=1.00000
wave_r=0.500
wave_g=0.500
wave_b=0.500
wave_x=0.500
wave_y=0.500
ob_size=0.000
ob_r=0.000
ob_g=0.000
ob_b=0.000
ob_a=1.000
ib_size=0.002
ib_r=0.000
ib_g=0.000

mv_dx=0.000

mv_g=1.000

b1n=0.000
b2n=0.000
b3n=0.000
b1x=1.000
b2x=1.000
b3x=1.000
b1ed=0.000
wavecode_0_enabled=1
wavecode_0_samples=512
wavecode_0_sep=0
wavecode_0_bSpectrum=1
wavecode_0_bUseDots=0
wavecode_0_bDrawThick=0
wavecode_0_bAdditive=0
wavecode_0_scaling=81.95430
wavecode_0_smoothing=0.80000
wavecode_0_r=1.000
wavecode_0_g=1.000
wavecode_0_b=1.000
wavecode_0_a=0.000
wave_0_per_point1=i=i+1;      i1=i%512;
wave_0_per_point2=
wave_0_per_point3=
wave_0_per_point4=c=(.5*q1)%2;
wave_0_per_point5=gmegabuf(i1)=if(c,gmegabuf(i1),value1);
wave_0_per_point6=
wave_0_per_point7=
wavecode_1_enabled=0
wavecode_1_samples=512
wavecode_1_sep=0
wavecode_1_bSpectrum=1
wavecode_1_bUseDots=1

wavecode_1_smoothing=0.70000

wavecode_1_g=1.000
wavecode_1_b=1.000

wavecode_3_g=0.700
wavecode_3_b=1.000
wavecode_3_a=0.600
shapecode_0_enabled=0
shapecode_0_sides=30
shapecode_0_additive=0
shapecode_0_thickOutline=0
shapecode_0_textured=0
shapecode_0_num_inst=1
shapecode_0_x=0.500
shapecode_0_y=0.500
shapecode_0_rad=0.06177
shapecode_0_ang=0.00000
shapecode_0_tex_ang=6.28319
shapecode_0_tex_zoom=0.53426
shapecode_0_r=0.400
shapecode_0_g=1.000
shapecode_0_b=0.000
shapecode_0_a=1.000
shapecode_0_r2=0.000
shapecode_0_g2=0.100
shapecode_0_b2=0.000
shapecode_0_a2=1.000
shapecode_0_border_r=0.300
shapecode_0_border_g=0.300
shapecode_0_border_b=0.300
shapecode_0_border_a=0.030
shapecode_1_enabled=0
shapecode_1_sides=40
shapecode_1_additive=0
shapecode_1_thickOutline=0
shapecode_1_textured=0
shapecode_1_num_inst=2
shapecode_1_x=0.500
shapecode_1_y=0.080
shapecode_1_rad=0.05031
shapecode_1_ang=0.00000
shapecode_1_tex_ang=0.00000
shapecode_1_tex_zoom=0.50828
shapecode_1_r=1.000
shapecode_1_g=0.600
shapecode_1_b=0.000
shapecode_1_a=1.000
shapecode_1_r2=0.100
shapecode_1_g2=0.000
shapecode_1_b2=0.000
shapecode_1_a2=1.000
shapecode_1_border_r=1.000
shapecode_1_border_g=1.000
shapecode_1_border_b=1.000
shapecode_1_border_a=0.000
shape_1_per_frame1=c=equal(instance,0);
shape_1_per_frame2=x=if(c,q1,-q1);
shape_1_per_frame3=y=if(c,q2,-q2);
shape_1_per_frame4=
shape_1_per_frame5=x=.5 + x/q6;     y=.5 + .5*y;    
shapecode_2_enabled=1
shapecode_2_sides=40
shapecode_2_additive=0
shapecode_2_thickOutline=0
shapecode_2_textured=1
shapecode_2_num_inst=1
shapecode_2_x=0.490
shapecode_2_y=0.500
shapecode_2_rad=0.19978
shapecode_2_ang=0.00000
shapecode_2_tex_ang=0.00000
shapecode_2_tex_zoom=2.89985
shapecode_2_r=1.000
shapecode_2_g=1.000
shapecode_2_b=1.000
shapecode_2_a=1.000
shapecode_2_r2=1.000
shapecode_2_g2=1.000
shapecode_2_b2=1.000
shapecode_2_a2=1.000
shapecode_2_border_r=1.000
shapecode_2_border_g=1.000
shapecode_2_border_b=1.000
shapecode_2_border_a=0.000
shape_2_per_frame1=a = bass_att/2;
shape_2_per_frame2=a2 = bass_att/2;
shape_2_per_frame3=
shape_2_per_frame4=tex_ang = time*.4;
shapecode_3_enabled=1
shapecode_3_sides=20
shapecode_3_additive=1
shapecode_3_thickOutline=0
shapecode_3_textured=0
shapecode_3_num_inst=1024
shapecode_3_x=0.380
shapecode_3_y=0.280
shapecode_3_rad=0.01000
shapecode_3_ang=0.00000
shapecode_3_tex_ang=0.00000
shapecode_3_tex_zoom=1.00000
shapecode_3_r=1.000
shapecode_3_g=1.000
shapecode_3_b=0.000
shapecode_3_a=1.000
shapecode_3_r2=0.000
shapecode_3_g2=0.000
shapecode_3_b2=0.000
shapecode_3_a2=1.000
shapecode_3_border_r=1.000
shapecode_3_border_g=1.000
shapecode_3_border_b=1.000
shapecode_3_border_a=0.000
shape_3_per_frame1=in=instance;     sa=in/1024;   t=6.28*sa+time;
shape_3_per_frame2=
shape_3_per_frame3=d=6*gmegabuf(.5*in);
shape_3_per_frame4=
shape_3_per_frame5=x1 =sin(t);  y1 =cos(t);
shape_3_per_frame6=
shape_3_per_frame7=z=.1+d;
shape_3_per_frame8=
shape_3_per_frame9=x=.5 + z*x1/q6;        y=.5+ z*y1;
shape_3_per_frame10=
shape_3_per_frame11=
shape_3_per_frame12=r=.05+5*d*d;    g=.03+3*d*d*d;
shape_3_per_frame13=r2=r;           g2=g;
shape_3_per_frame14=
shape_3_per_frame15=
shape_3_per_frame16=ang=t;
shape_3_per_frame17=
shape_3_per_frame18=a = min(x1*x1 + y1*y1,1)/2;
shape_3_per_frame19=a2 = a;
per_frame_init_1=i=0;    loop(10000, 
per_frame_init_2=
per_frame_init_3=gmegabuf(i)=0;
per_frame_init_4=
per_frame_init_5=i=i+1;);
per_frame_1=wave_a=0;    warp=0;
per_frame_2=decay=.5;    
per_frame_3=q6=aspecty;
per_frame_4=
per_frame_5=bt=bt+bass/fps;
per_frame_6=q1=bt;
per_pixel_1=zoom=1.02 + .06*rad;
warp_1=`shader_body {
warp_2=`
warp_3=`
warp_4=`ret = (GetPixel(uv)*.9-.01);
warp_5=`//ret = 0;
warp_6=`}
comp_1=`sampler sampler_pw_noise_lq;
comp_2=`float2 uv0, uv1, uv2,uv4,rsk,dz1,Kugel1;;
comp_3=`static const float sw1 =  1;
comp_4=`static const float sw2 =  0.75;
comp_5=`
comp_6=`shader_body {
comp_7=`uv0 = uv;
comp_8=`uv2 = float2(.2/length((uv-.5))+time/4,ang/3.14)*2;
comp_9=`uv2 = float2(.2/length((uv-.5)*(1+2*tex2D (sampler_noise_hq,uv/32+time*.01)).rg)+time/4,ang/3.14)*2;
comp_10=`
comp_11=`float mod = length(sin(uv2*3.141/2+time*.1));
comp_12=`float2 noise = tex2D (sampler_noise_hq,uv2+mod).rg;
comp_13=`float mask = (noise.r <= sw2);
comp_14=`float2 rohr = sw1*rad * (noise-.5) /2*mask;
comp_15=`
comp_16=`uv1 = float2(1-uv.x,uv.y);
comp_17=`ret =  GetPixel(uv)+GetPixel(uv1);
comp_18=`
comp_19=`float3 back = .2*(.5+(uv.x-.5)*0+(uv.y-.5)*q2);
comp_20=`uv+= rohr * sw1;
comp_21=`
comp_22=`uv1 = float2(1-uv.x,uv.y);
comp_23=`ret += (GetBlur2(uv) + GetBlur2(uv1)) *min(.5+treb_att/4,2) *(1+1*sw1) * saturate(1-lum(ret)/2);
comp_24=`ret += back;
comp_25=`}
